I20070208-2030

Looks like a dup of bug 164362, but isn't (exception is one line earlier).

Found this in the log after showing CVS annotation in editor (for org.eclipse.ui/popupMenus.exsd), comparing two old revisions, showing annotation for old revision.

I tried to reproduce, but I could not find steps to provoke this.
